message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $10,500. This price still allows me to make a profit while ensuring a fair deal for both of us. Let's find a common ground.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. I really think this product would be a great addition to my business, and I'm willing to pay a fair price for it.
